body:
Comment 1: 
golang.org _does_ show results referring to package time:

http://golang.org/search?q=time

There's a reference to the time package:

http://golang.org/search?q=time#Local_pkg/time/

That said, godoc should probably prioritize such search results and move them to the top.
_Owner changed to @griesemer._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
